org.nd4j.autodiff.listeners.BaseListener

    Package Description

    • Uses of BaseListener in org.nd4j.autodiff.listeners

      Subclasses of BaseListener in org.nd4j.autodiff.listeners 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BaseEvaluationListener
      A base listener class that will preform the provided evaluations, and provide the results in epochEnd and validationDone Instead of overriding requiredVariables, epochStart, epochEnd, validationDone, and/or opExecution, override otherRequiredVariables, epochStartEvaluations, epochEndEvaluations, validationDoneEvaluations, and/or opExecutionEvaluations If you want to use Evaluations in your listener, extend this class

    • Uses of BaseListener in org.nd4j.autodiff.listeners.checkpoint

      Subclasses of BaseListener in org.nd4j.autodiff.listeners.checkpoint 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CheckpointListener
      CheckpointListener: The goal of this listener is to periodically save a copy of the model during training..

    • Uses of BaseListener in org.nd4j.autodiff.listeners.debugging

      Subclasses of BaseListener in org.nd4j.autodiff.listeners.debugging 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ArraySavingListener 
      class  ExecDebuggingListener
      A listener that logs operation execution for debugging purposes. 3 modes are supported:

      OPS_ONLY: Only the operations names are printed.
      class  OpBenchmarkListener
      A simple listener for benchmarking single operations in SameDiff
      Supports 2 modes:
      - SINGLE_ITER_PRINT: Print the runtime of the first iteration
      - AGGREGATE: Collect statistics for multiple runs, that can be accessed (by op name) via #getAggregateModeMap()

    • Uses of BaseListener in org.nd4j.autodiff.listeners.impl

      Subclasses of BaseListener in org.nd4j.autodiff.listeners.impl 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HistoryListener
      HistoryListener is mainly used internally to collect information such as the loss curve and evaluations, which will be reported later in a History instance
      class  ScoreListener
      A listener that reports scores and performance metrics for each epoch.
      class  UIListener
      User interface listener for SameDiff

      Basic usage: UIListener l = UIListener.builder(f) //Plot loss curve, at every iteration (enabled and set to 1 by default) .plotLosses(1) //Plot the training set evaluation metrics: accuracy and f1 score .trainEvaluationMetrics("softmax", 0, Evaluation.Metric.ACCURACY, Evaluation.Metric.F1) //Plot the parameter to update:ratios for each parameter, every 10 iterations .updateRatios(10) .build();
      Note that the UIListener supports continuing with the same network on the same file - but only if the network configuration matches.

    • Uses of BaseListener in org.nd4j.autodiff.listeners.profiler

      Subclasses of BaseListener in org.nd4j.autodiff.listeners.profiler 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ProfilingListener
      SameDiff profiling listener: for profiling operation execution
      Writes profiles to a file in JSON format
      Format is Chrome profiler format.

    • Uses of BaseListener in org.nd4j.autodiff.validation

      Subclasses of BaseListener in org.nd4j.autodiff.validation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ActivationGradientCheckListener
      A listener used for debugging and testing purposes - specifically for gradient checking activations internally in GradCheckUtil.

    • Uses of BaseListener in org.nd4j.autodiff.validation.listeners
